title: Animal Health (Establishment of Tsetse Control Pickets and Check Points) Regulations, 2020
content:
27thOctober,2020 Statutory Instruments 531
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.86 OF2020
TheAnimal Health Act
(ActNo.27of2010)
The Animal Health (Establishment of Tsetse Control
Pickets and Check Points) Regulations, 2020
INEXERCISEofthe powerscontainedinsection 2oftheAnimal
HealthAct,2010,thefollowingRegulationsaremade:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health Title
(Establishment of Tsetse Control Pickets and Check Points)
Regulations,2020.
2. The Tsetse control pickets and check points on roads and Tsetse
recognised footpaths are as set out in the Schedule for the areas control
picketsand
specifiedintheSchedule. checkpoints
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
532 Statutory Instruments 27th October,2020
SCHEDULE
(Regulation2)
TSETSECONTROLPICKETSANDCHECKPOINTS
No. TsetseControlPicket(site) District Province
1 Sinjela:onGreatEast Rufunsa Lusaka
Road
2 Mphomwa: on Chipata- Chipata Eastern
Mfuwe Road
3 Msoro: on Mfuwe-Katete Mambwe Eastern
Road
4 Nalusanga:onLusaka- Mumbwa Central
MonguRoad
5 Tateyoyo: on Lusaka- Nkeyema Western
MonguRoad
6 Mulobezi:onNkeyema- Mulobezi Western
MwandiRoad
PROF.N. LUO,
Minister of Fisheries and Livestock
LUSAKA
27/10/2020
[MFL/101/8/6]
